mapper.select: SELECT count(ti.id) as num,ti.id as inn_id, o.address,o.created_at as create_date, split_part(o.address,' ',1) as province,split_part(o.address,' ',3) as city from tomato_inn_customers o LEFT JOIN tomato_inn ti ON ti.id = o.inn_id where o.created_at BETWEEN '${startDate}' AND '${endDate}' GROUP BY ti.id, o.address,o.created_at
